statements: UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.8 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:00:00';

UPDATE WeatherData SET Temperature = 25.5, Humidity = 70 WHERE Date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE FlightConditions SET WeatherCondition = 'Sunny', WindSpeedLimit = 10.3 WHERE Date = '2022-09-15';

UPDATE flight_schedules SET arrival_time = '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 101;

UPDATE flights SET condition_id = (SELECT condition_id FROM weather_conditions WHERE condition_name = 'Rainy'), airport_id = (SELECT airport_id FROM airports WHERE airport_code = 'JFK') WHERE flight_id = 5;
